languages.text: "Если губернатор искренен в своей вере и служении Императору, то, я уверена, он делает все, что в его силах".

traits.locale_text: "Если губернатор искренен в своей вере и служении Императору, то, я уверена, он делает все, что в его силах".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "If the governor is sincere in his faith and service to the Emperor, then I am confident that he is doing everything within his power."
languages.original_text: "Если губернатор искренен в своей вере и служении Императору, то, я уверена, он делает все, что в его силах".

traits.locale_text: "If the governor is sincere in his faith and service to the Emperor, then I am confident that he is doing everything within his power."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If the governor is sincere in his faith and service to the Emperor, then I am confident that he is doing everything within his power."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If the governor is sincere in his faith and service to the Emperor, then I am confident that he is doing everything within his power."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If the governor is sincere in his faith and service to the Emperor, then I am confident that he is doing everything within his power."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “如果总督对他的信仰、对帝皇的忠诚是真诚的，那么我相信，他正在努力做好力所能及的一切。”
languages.original_text: "If the governor is sincere in his faith and service to the Emperor, then I am confident that he is doing everything within his power."

traits.locale_text: “如果总督对他的信仰、对帝皇的忠诚是真诚的，那么我相信，他正在努力做好力所能及的一切。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Si el gobernador es sincero en su fe y servicio al Emperador, estará haciendo todo lo que esté en su mano».
languages.original_text: "If the governor is sincere in his faith and service to the Emperor, then I am confident that he is doing everything within his power."

traits.locale_text: «Si el gobernador es sincero en su fe y servicio al Emperador, estará haciendo todo lo que esté en su mano».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「総督が皇帝への忠誠を誓っているのであれば、きっとその全力を尽くしていることだろう」
languages.original_text: "If the governor is sincere in his faith and service to the Emperor, then I am confident that he is doing everything within his power."

traits.locale_text: 「総督が皇帝への忠誠を誓っているのであれば、きっとその全力を尽くしていることだろう」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Falls der Gouverneur aufrichtig in seinem Glauben und in seinem Dienst für den Imperator ist, bin ich zuversichtlich, dass er alles in seiner Macht stehende tut."
languages.original_text: "If the governor is sincere in his faith and service to the Emperor, then I am confident that he is doing everything within his power."

traits.locale_text: "Falls der Gouverneur aufrichtig in seinem Glauben und in seinem Dienst für den Imperator ist, bin ich zuversichtlich, dass er alles in seiner Macht stehende tut."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Si le gouverneur a foi en l'Empereur et prend son service à cœur, alors nul doute qu'il fait tout ce qui est en son pouvoir. »
languages.original_text: "If the governor is sincere in his faith and service to the Emperor, then I am confident that he is doing everything within his power."

traits.locale_text: « Si le gouverneur a foi en l'Empereur et prend son service à cœur, alors nul doute qu'il fait tout ce qui est en son pouvoir. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Vali, İmparator'a olan inanç ve hizmetinde samimiyse elinden geleni ardına koymadığından eminim."
languages.original_text: "If the governor is sincere in his faith and service to the Emperor, then I am confident that he is doing everything within his power."
